title: Lenovo is more than just PCs. Here's how they're focusing on sustainable and AI-focused solutions for customers.
description: Lenovo, the world's leading PC company, is shifting to sustainable and AI-focused, service-led technologies for its customers.

title: Circular Luxury Fashion Represents A Dilemma For Existing Brands

title: In 2024, CMOs Will Prioritize Practicality Over Purpose
description: If 2023 was the year of generative AI exploration, 2024 will be the year of generative AI experimentation.
